content: Anyone know (roughly!) what time nightly builds are available each day? I'm setting up the new crontab for the playground, and aiming for close to when it's available would be ideal.
Roughly 1am UTC, should definitely be out by 2am.
Beta and stable both release at roughly arbitrary times (not automated today).
Well, beta is automated but dependent on bors merge which is not timed.
ok dokie, that's fine. I can add a manual trigger button thing
Could we add some notification hook from the release publication process to the playground?
I would rather not add more things we need to trigger, but I would not be opposed to adding some automated hook to e.g. triagebot
I mean, the "failure" case is that the beta/release is on the playground 24h later than it could be
